text: pRuqShThairEqvartUnaq-nvArO#hantyRuqtuBi#H saM~MvathsaqraM tE sa#M~Mvathsaqra Eqva prati# tiShThanti bRuhad-rathantaqrAByA$M ~MyantIqyaM ~MvAva ra#thaMtaqramaqsau bRuqhadAqByAmEqva yaqntyathO# aqnayO#rEqva prati# tiShThantyEqtE vai yaqj~jasyA$~jjaqsAya#nI sruqtI tAByA#mEqva su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ~Mya#nti triqvRuda#gniShTOqmO Ba#vatiq tEja# EqvAva# rundhatE pa~jcadaqSO Ba#vatIndriqyamEqvAva# rundhatE saptadaqSO- [  ] 2
